title: Ascender Corporation
content:
Ascender Corporation is a provider of advanced font products specializing in type design, font development and licensing. Ascender's founders [Bill Davis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bill%20Davis), [Steve Matteson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Steve%20Matteson), [Thomas Rickner](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thomas%20Rickner), and many others are font industry veterans and have been involved in developing fonts used in computers, phones and many other hardware & software products. Ascender provides multilingual, custom font development. Ascender also offers high quality fonts for download from the Ascender Font Store website.

[www.ascendercorp.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225300/http:/www.ascendercorp.com/ "www.ascendercorp.com")
author: James Grieshaber
